message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $110. It's a great deal for you and I'm confident you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think.
Hello Alice, thank you for offering the product. I understand its value, but I believe I can't pay more than $95 for it. Looking forward to your response.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I can't go that low. I'm willing to come down to $105. This is a fair price considering the value of the product. Let's see if we can reach an agreement.
Hello Alice, I've considered your latest offer, but I still feel that $95 would be a fair price for the product. I hope you can meet me halfway.
